name: Firmware Infirmary Pre-Beta
description:
Firmware Infirmary Pre-Beta

  • Controls:
    • Forward - W
    • Left - A
    • Backward - S
    • Right - D
    • Select: Left Click
      • To further explain, select is used to click on interactables. (I.e. buttons) 
    •  Menu: ESC for all menus. 
      • Can Change mouse sensitivity in video settings. 
    •  Dialogue: Respond via clicking on a red-text option 
  • Repair Micro-game: 
    • Mouse-based 
    • Select: Left click 
    • Click on highlighted area 
    • Move objects: Left click and drag into correct location 
    • Must complete before you run out of "action points" represented by a slider 
  • Paint Micro-game: 
    • Click right-hand-side color options to create on the left the color that is desired 
    • Click accept color to see if the color is right. 
    • Will move to painting section 
    • Hold Left Click to paint: paint within the circle, accept paintjob when complete 
    • Make sure to finish dialogue to exit.
  • Goals: 
    •   A. Turn on the light with the button.  
    • B. open the "Ring Camera" With the other button.  
    • C. Click on tube button to launch micro-game section and play microgame.  
    • D. Talk during micro-games  
    • E. Complete Microgames  
    • F. Finish both microgames  
    • G. Exit patient screen  
    • H. Restart/END
